ResearchProjectDef.label: aetheric synthesis
ResearchProjectDef.description: Cook simple food and craft basic items using aether crystals as a catalyst.\n\nCan only be researched by someone capable of manipulating aether.

ResearchProjectDef.label: basic alchemy
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft simple medicines and potions from mundane ingredients using alchemical synthesis.\n\nCan only be researched by someone capable of manipulating aether.

ResearchProjectDef.label: crystal synthesis
ResearchProjectDef.description: Synthesize aether crystals by condensing natural energies into physical form.\n\nCan only be researched by someone capable of manipulating aether.

ResearchProjectDef.label: aetheric devices
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build useful everyday devices such as heaters and coolers powered by aether crystals.\n\nCan only be researched by someone capable of manipulating aether.

ResearchProjectDef.label: advanced synthesis
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft complex items using aether crystals as a catalyst.\n\nCan only be researched by someone capable of manipulating aether.

ResearchProjectDef.label: advanced accumulators
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build advanced accumulators capable of taking advantage of natural geological features.\n\nCan only be researched by someone capable of manipulating aether.

ResearchProjectDef.label: aetheric carpentry
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft sophisticated wood-based weapons at an aetheric crafting table using ice and wind crystals as a catalyst.\n\nCan only be researched by someone capable of manipulating aether.

ResearchProjectDef.label: aetheric blacksmithing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft sophisticated metallic weapons at an aetheric crafting table using earth and fire crystals as a catalyst.\n\nCan only be researched by someone capable of manipulating aether.

ResearchProjectDef.label: aetheric armorsmithing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft metallic armor at an aetheric crafting table using earth and ice crystals as a catalyst.\n\nCan only be researched by someone capable of manipulating aether.

ResearchProjectDef.label: aetheric leatherworking
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft leather armor at an aetheric crafting table using earth and wind crystals as a catalyst.\n\nCan only be researched by someone capable of manipulating aether.

ResearchProjectDef.label: aetheric weaving
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft complex clothing at an aetheric crafting table using lightning and wind crystals as a catalyst.\n\nCan only be researched by someone capable of manipulating aether.

ResearchProjectDef.label: arcane machinery
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build mechanical devices capable of manipulating aether.\n\nCan only be researched by someone capable of manipulating aether.

ResearchProjectDef.label: aetherytes
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build aetherytes, stationary arcane devices that act as teleportation anchors.\n\nCan only be researched by someone capable of manipulating aether.

ResearchProjectDef.label: aetheric transmission
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build aetheric link towers that can link together aether accumulators, capacitors, and devices.\n\nCan only be researched by someone capable of manipulating aether.

ResearchProjectDef.label: aetheric fabrication
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft basic industrial components using aetheric machine tools.\n\nCan only be researched by someone capable of manipulating aether.

ResearchProjectDef.label: aetheric firearms
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft precision-machined ranged weapons using aetheric machine tools.\n\nCan only be researched by someone capable of manipulating aether.

ResearchProjectDef.label: aetheroelectricity
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build aetheric devices that interact with electricity.\n\nCan only be researched by someone capable of manipulating aether.
